packages.title: Explore Grand Vietnam
packages.subtitle: With Phu Quoc & Sapa
packages.description:
Overview

Experience the complete Vietnam journey on this comprehensive 14-day grand tour from Hanoi to Ho Chi Minh City. Discover Vietnam’s incredible diversity: trek Sapa’s mountain villages, cruise Halong Bay’s emerald waters, explore Hue’s imperial citadel, wander Hoi An’s lantern-lit streets, and experience Saigon’s vibrant energy.

This Vietnam grand tour visits four UNESCO World Heritage Sites while immersing you deeply in authentic Vietnamese culture through daily signature experiences. Trek with ethnic minorities, learn traditional crafts, share meals with local families, and discover hidden gems beyond typical tourist routes. Small groups (max 16), expert local guides, and thoughtfully crafted experiences reveal the real Vietnam.

Duration:14 days, 13 nights

Departure: Daily from Hanoi

Language: Professional English-speaking guides

Style: Complete cultural immersion

VIETNAM GRAND TOUR DESCRIPTION

Complete Vietnam experience

Journey Vietnam’s full length experiencing extraordinary diversity: Sapa’s mountain tribes, Halong Bay’s limestone karsts, Hue’s royal heritage, Hoi An’s ancient charm, and Saigon’s modern energy. Each destination reveals unique cultural treasures.

Four UNESCO World Heritage sites
Explore Vietnam’s most celebrated places with expert guidance: Halong Bay, Hue Imperial City, Hoi An Ancient Town, and My Son Sanctuary. Deep historical insights bring centuries of heritage to life.
Daily signature experiences

Beyond sightseeing, participate in exclusive cultural encounters: Tai Chi with Hanoi locals, fishing with Halong families, Sapa homestay with H’mong tribe, royal tea ceremony in Hue, lantern crafting in Hoi An, meeting war veterans in Saigon. Authentic interactions create unforgettable memories.

Small group advantage

Maximum 16 travelers ensure personalized attention, meaningful local interactions, and flexibility to adjust activities. Unlike large tour buses, our intimate groups connect authentically with Vietnamese communities.

VIETNAM GRAND TOUR IMPORTANT NOTES

Accommodation:13 nights (11 nights 4-star hotels, 1 night premium Halong cruise, 1 night overnight train to Sapa)

Pace:Balanced itinerary with guided cultural activities and 3 free days for independent exploration

What to bring:Comfortable walking/trekking shoes, modest temple attire, layers for Sapa mountains, sun protection, rain jacket, swimwear, camera

Best time:Spring (Mar-May) perfect nationwide; Summer (Jun-Aug) beach season; Autumn (Sep-Nov) harvest festivals; Winter (Dec-Feb) warm south, cool north

Cultural sites:Modest dress required (covered shoulders/knees); shoes removed at temples and homes

Fitness level:Moderate (comfortable walking 4-6 hours; Sapa trekking moderate difficulty)
inclusions: Professional local guides:Expert English-speaking guides throughout with deep cultural knowledge and passion
Complete transportation: Private air-conditioned vehicles, domestic flights (Hanoi-Hue, Hoi An-Saigon), premium Halong Bay cruise, overnight train to Sapa
Accommodation: 13 nights (11 nights 4-star centrally located hotels, 1 night premium Halong cruise cabin, 1 night comfortable train sleeper berth)
Comprehensive meals:13 breakfasts, 11 lunches, 8 dinners (including meals you prepare in cooking classes and homestay meals)
All entrance fees: 4 UNESCO sites, temples, museums, cultural attractions, national parks
Cultural activities: Cooking classes with market tours, traditional craft workshops, water puppet show, temple ceremonies, local family visits
Unique adventures:Halong kayaking/swimming, Sapa valley trekking, dragon boat cruise, lantern floating ceremony
exclusions: International flights:Flights to/from Vietnam (we can assist with recommendations)
Vietnam visa fees:Entry visa costs (e-visa available online for most nationalities)
Personal expenses:Shopping, additional snacks, souvenirs, optional activities during free days
Travel insurance:Comprehensive travel insurance (highly recommended, available through partners)
Tips for guides/drivers:Tipping kitty $180-220 per person recommended but voluntary
Beverages:Soft drinks, alcohol, specialty beverages beyond included meals
Optional activities: Activities chosen during 3 free days, additional excursions

terms.title: Travel Validity
points: The deal is valid for travel till Monday, 30 March 2026.

terms.title: Guaranteed Dates
points: Travel is valid on Fixed Dates.

terms.title: Visa Easy
points: Visa can be availed on arrival.

terms.title: Booking Policy
points: At the time of booking: 50% of the total package cost per person or cancellation charges whichever is higher (non-refundable and non-transferable)
Within 30 Days from Date of Departure: 75% of Full Tour Cost or cancellation charges whichever is higher (non-refundable and non-transferable)
15 Days from Date of Departure: 100% of Full Tour Cost

terms.title: Cancellation Policy
points: 31 and More Days prior to the Departure Date: Booking Amount is Non-Refundable
30 to 16 Days prior to the Departure Date: 75% of the full Tour cost
15 Days prior to the Departure Date: 100% of the full Tour cost

itinerary.title: Arrival in Hanoi
itinerary.description:
'Welcome to the Heart of Vietnam'
Today's Highlight: Authentic Old Quarter Walking Food Safari

Once landed within Hanoi's airport, convenient transportation is provided, escorting travelers toward their lodging in the Old Quarter. A Vietnam vacation gets underway with engaging walking excursions along Hanoi's ancient pathways, including a tour of the celebrated Ngoc Son Temple. Savor truly genuine Vietnamese food while discovering regional culinary customs, characterizing authentic Vietnamese journey experiences.

Accommodation:Four-star hotels provide lodging in Hanoi's vibrant Old Quarter.

Meals:Enjoy delightful Vietnamese cuisine in authentic dining experiences.

Signature Experience:Unforgettable food safaris, revealing hidden gems, are expertly led.

Notes: Comfortable footwear is recommended. Furthermore, respectful attire is required when visiting sacred temples during package explorations.

itinerary.title: Hanoi Cultural Discovery
itinerary.description:
'Discovering Vietnam's Cultural Essence'

Vietnam's deep cultural heritage is best experienced. Mornings begin with Tai Chi, led by experts from Hanoi, at Hoan Kiem Lake. Incredible Vietnam tours include visits to the Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum, the unique One Pillar Pagoda, a UNESCO site, and the historic Temple of Literature. Vietnamese cuisine is savored through Old Quarter food tours, which include pho and egg coffee. Traditional water puppet shows are enjoyed in the evening, accompanied by meet-ups with puppet masters.

Accommodation: Four-star hotels provide lodging in Hanoi's vibrant Old Quarter.

Meals:Genuine Vietnamese cuisine is included in lunches, traditional dinners, and breakfasts.

Signature Experience:Unique Tai Chi sessions within the community are featured, and puppet workshops will also be given.

Notes: The Mausoleum is closed on Mondays and Fridays.

itinerary.title: Hanoi to Halong Bay
itinerary.description:
'Halong Bay Beckons: An Unforgettable Sunset Fishing Adventure'

A luxurious cruise through the breathtaking, UNESCO-recognized Halong Bay is featured within your Vietnam getaway. Magnificent limestone formations are navigated aboard a top-tier boat while the amazing Sung Sot Cave is discovered. Traditional net-casting methods, passed down across generations, are taught at dusk alongside local fishing communities. Enjoyable swimming and kayaking are experienced before a delectable, freshly-caught seafood dinner is savored as a stunning sunset colors the bay.

Accommodation: Premium cabins with scenic windows are available on the luxury vessel as accommodation options.

Meals:Breakfast, seafood lunch, and fresh-catch dinner are included.

Signature Experience:A traditional fishing lesson from local families is a signature experience.

Notes: Swimwear is recommended for aquatic activities. Weather-contingent experiences and access to the UNESCO site are noted.

itinerary.title: Halong Bay to Hanoi
itinerary.description:
'Discover Halong Bay: An Unforgettable Dawn-to-Dusk Adventure'

Featured Today: Immerse Yourself in Floating Village Culture A serene Tai Chi session at sunrise on deck is experienced as limestone karsts emerge from the horizon. Your Vietnam vacation encompasses exploration of genuine aquatic communities inhabited by generations. Pearl cultivation and eco-friendly fishing techniques are learned from local inhabitants. Subsequently, a comfortable overnight train transit facilitates entry to Sapa's majestic highlands.

Accommodation: Overnight travel via plush sleeping berths to Lao Cai.

Meals:Breakfast is served at a floating village, and a customary midday meal is provided.

Unique Activity:A tea ritual is enjoyed alongside fishing families in their aquatic residences.

Notes:A mountainous climate preparedness kit is furnished; relaxed attire is advised for railway travel.

itinerary.title: Sapa Mountain Adventure
itinerary.description:
'Sapa Adventures: Trek into Scenic Splendor'

Sapa's incredible discovery is now available. Generally, arrival check-in commences at 2:00 PM. A distinctive Vietnam adventure is presented, allowing access ahead of time to impressive rice paddies. Professional photography guidance is delivered, promising magnificent pictures. A fascinating mountain heritage is experienced through an educational tour of Cat Cat settlement. Guests are greeted by native H'mong clans. An age-old weaving showcase is appreciated. A cultural exchange is fostered through an unforgettable homestay experience, complete with a memorable meal.

Accommodation: A mountain hotel exhibiting terrace outlooks.

Meals:Village fare for lunch is provided, along with a hosted meal.

Unique Activity:Photographic mentoring and a weaving class are provided.

Notes: Moderate-intensity trekking is required. Rain protection is crucial. Local traditions must be respected.

packages.title: Vietnam Honeymoon Special
packages.subtitle: Romance in Halong Bay, Da Nang & Phu Quoc
packages.description:
Overview

Celebrate love on a beautifully curated Vietnam Honeymoon Special designed exclusively for couples seeking romance, relaxation, and unforgettable moments. This journey blends breathtaking natural beauty with luxury stays, private experiences, and intimate cultural encounters.

From cruising the emerald waters of Halong Bay to romantic candlelight dinners in Da Nang and tranquil beach escapes in Phu Quoc, every detail is crafted to create lifelong memories. Enjoy privacy, personalized services, and dreamy experiences ideal for newlyweds.

Duration: 8 days, 7 nights

Departure: Daily from Hanoi

Style: Romantic luxury & leisure
highlights: Golden Bridge at Ba Na Hills
inclusions: Private transfers: Airport pickups, intercity transfers in private air-conditioned vehicles
Luxury accommodation: 7 nights in handpicked 4 & 5-star romantic resorts and hotels
Meals: Daily breakfast, selected romantic dinners, honeymoon cake & wine
Experiences: Private Halong Bay cruise, sunset cruise, couple spa session
Sightseeing: All major attractions with private guide
Special touches: Room decoration, flower arrangements, honeymoon surprises
exclusions: International flights: Flights to and from Vietnam
Tips: Optional tipping for guides and drivers

Enjoy a private sunset cruise with drinks and romantic music, creating picture-perfect honeymoon memories.

packages.title: Epic Bali Trails - Ex Ahemdabad
packages.subtitle: 7N Bali
packages.description:
Overview

Embark on an exciting Bali group journey filled with adventure, culture, and scenic highlights. Enjoy thrilling water sports at Benoa Beach, witness the stunning Uluwatu Sunset, and explore the artistic charm of Ubud with the famous Bali Swing experience. Discover the grandeur of GWK Cultural Park and spend a fun-filled day at Trans Studio Theme Park. This group departure is designed to offer seamless travel, memorable experiences, and the perfect blend of relaxation and exploration in Bali.
inclusions: 4N Accommodation at Golden Tulip Kuta or similar Hotel
3N Accommodation at Four points by sheraton ungasan or similar Hotel
Water Sport at Tanjung Benoa Beach: Jet skiing, Parasailing & Banana Boat ride
Full day Ubud tour - Bali swing, Yeh hoo Waterfall , Ubud palace, Ubud village tour, coffee plantation

hotelAccommodation.hotel: The Artini Dijiwa Ubud / Ubud Village Resort
The ONE Legian / Courtyard by Marriott Seminyak

itinerary.title: Arrival In Bali
itinerary.description:
• Meet & Greet at Denpasar Airport
  • Transfer to your hotel and Check in. Your Evening is at Leisure to explore on your own.
  • Overnight stay at your Hotel.

itinerary.title: Water Sports at Benoa Beach - Uluwatu Sunset Tour
itinerary.description:
• Breakfast at the Hotel
  • Way to Tanjung Benoa Beach for an exciting water sports experience including Parasailing, Jet Skiing, and a fun Banana Boat Ride.
  • Later, visit the majestic Uluwatu Temple, perched dramatically on a cliff overlooking the Indian Ocean.
  • Overnight stay at your Hotel.

itinerary.title: Fun Day at Trans Studio Bali
itinerary.description:
• Breakfast at the Hotel
  • start your Fun day at Trans Studio Bali - Fly over Indonesia.
  • Later,Go on a shopping tour in the markets of kuta.
  • Overnight stay at your Hotel.

itinerary.title: Day At Leisure
itinerary.description:
• Breakfast at the Hotel
  • Your day is at leisure to explore on your own.
  • Overnight stay at your Hotel.

itinerary.title: Inter Hotel Transfer - Garuda Wisnu Kencana Park
itinerary.description:
• Breakfast at the Hotel
  • After breakfast, check out from your kuta hotel and head to ungasan Hotel.
  • After check in: Use the complimentary GWK shuttle to explore Garuda Wisnu Kencana Park.
  • Overnight stay at your Hotel.

itinerary.title: Full day Ubud Tour
itinerary.description:
• Breakfast at the Hotel
  • Conclude your day at the scenic Yeh Hoo Waterfall, one of Bali’s most photogenic spots.
  • explore Ubud Village, visit the playful residents of the Monkey Forest, and experience the thrill of the Bali Swing overlooking the jungle.
  • Overnight stay at your Hotel.

itinerary.title: Day at Leisure
itinerary.description:
• Breakfast at the Hotel
  • Your day is at leisure to explore on your own.
  • Overnight stay at your Hotel.

itinerary.title: Departure from Bali
itinerary.description:
• After breakfast, it’s time to bid farewell to this island paradise.
  • Depending on your flight schedule, enjoy some last-minute shopping in Kuta’s vibrant markets before your private transfer to the airport for your onward journey.

packages.title: Dubai City Tour & Desert Safari
packages.subtitle: Modern Marvels, Arabian Culture & Golden Dunes
packages.description:
Overview

Experience the best of Dubai with an exciting blend of ultra-modern attractions, rich cultural heritage, and thrilling desert adventures. This Dubai City Tour & Desert Safari package is perfect for travelers seeking iconic sightseeing, luxury experiences, and unforgettable moments in the Arabian desert.

From towering skyscrapers and luxury malls to dune bashing, camel rides, and traditional Arabian entertainment, this journey showcases Dubai’s unique contrasts.

Duration: 5 days, 4 nights

Departure: Daily from Dubai

Style: City sightseeing & desert adventure
inclusions: Airport transfers: Return airport transfers on private or shared basis
Accommodation: 4 nights in well-appointed 4-star hotel in Dubai
Meals: Daily breakfast & BBQ dinner during desert safari
Sightseeing: Guided Dubai city tour & desert safari experience
Experiences: Dune bashing, camel ride, belly dance, Tanoura & fire show
Taxes: All applicable hotel taxes & tourism fees
exclusions: International flights: Flights to and from Dubai
Optional tours: Burj Khalifa entry, Dhow cruise, theme parks

itinerary.title: Arrival in Dubai
itinerary.description:
'Welcome to the City of Gold'

Arrive at Dubai International Airport and transfer to your hotel. The rest of the day is free for leisure or exploring nearby areas.

Accommodation: Hotel in Dubai

Meals: None

itinerary.description:

Enjoy a guided half-day Dubai city tour covering Jumeirah Mosque, Burj Al Arab photo stop, Palm Jumeirah, Atlantis The Palm, Dubai Marina, and Burj Khalifa (outside view).

Meals: Breakfast

itinerary.description:
'Adventure in the Arabian Desert'

Head into the desert for an unforgettable safari experience. Enjoy dune bashing, sandboarding, camel rides, followed by a BBQ dinner with live entertainment at a desert camp.

Meals: Breakfast, BBQ Dinner

itinerary.title: Day at Leisure

'Explore at Your Own Pace'

A free day to explore Dubai on your own or opt for additional tours such as Burj Khalifa At The Top, Dhow Cruise, or theme parks.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description:
'Goodbye Dubai'

After breakfast, transfer to the airport for your onward journey with unforgettable memories.

Meals: Breakfast

packages.title: Dubai Luxury Experience
packages.subtitle: Ultra-Luxury, Iconic Experiences & Desert Elegance
packages.description:
Overview

Indulge in the ultimate Dubai Luxury Experience crafted for travelers who seek exclusivity, comfort, and world-class hospitality. This premium journey combines iconic landmarks, VIP services, luxury accommodations, and bespoke experiences across the city and desert.

From staying in luxury hotels and enjoying private city tours to VIP Burj Khalifa access, yacht cruising, and a royal-style desert safari, every moment reflects Dubai’s signature opulence.

Duration: 6 days, 5 nights

Departure: Daily from Dubai

Style: Ultra-luxury, private & premium experiences
highlights: VIP Burj Khalifa At The Top
inclusions: Private airport transfers: Luxury vehicle transfers with meet & greet service
Luxury accommodation: 5 nights in handpicked 5-star luxury hotels
Meals: Daily breakfast, gourmet dining experiences, desert safari dinner
Sightseeing: Private guided city tour with VIP entry experiences
Experiences: VIP Burj Khalifa, luxury yacht cruise, premium desert safari
exclusions: International flights: Flights to and from Dubai
Optional upgrades: Helicopter ride, Burj Al Arab dining

packages.title: Ramadan Umrah Package
packages.subtitle: Spiritual Journey During the Blessed Month of Ramadan
packages.description:
Overview

Perform Umrah during the sacred month of Ramadan and experience unmatched spiritual rewards in the holy cities of Makkah and Madinah. This Ramadan Umrah Package is thoughtfully designed to provide comfort, convenience, and guided religious support throughout your journey.

Experience the serenity of fasting in the Haram, breaking fast with Iftar near the Holy Mosque, and offering Taraweeh prayers in the most sacred places of Islam.

Duration: 10 days, 9 nights

Departure: Fixed departures during Ramadan

Style: Spiritual, guided & comfortable pilgrimage
highlights: Umrah During Holy Month of Ramadan
Stay Close to Masjid Al Haram
inclusions: Accommodation: 9 nights in well-located hotels near Haram
Transportation: Airport transfers & intercity travel by AC coach
Guidance: Experienced religious guide for Umrah rituals
exclusions: International flights: Airfare to and from Saudi Arabia

itinerary.description:

Arrive at Jeddah International Airport, complete immigration formalities, and transfer to Makkah. Check-in and rest before preparing for Umrah.

Accommodation: Hotel in Makkah

Meals: Suhoor & Iftar

itinerary.description:
'Sacred Umrah Rituals'

Perform Umrah with guidance including Tawaf, Sa’i, and Halq/Qasr. Spend the rest of the day in prayers at Masjid Al Haram.

Meals: Suhoor & Iftar

itinerary.description:

Visit important Islamic landmarks including Jabal Al Noor, Jabal Al Thawr, Mina, Arafat, and Muzdalifah.

Spend the day in personal prayers, Quran recitation, and Taraweeh at Masjid Al Haram.

packages.title: 12 Jyotirlinga Complete Darshan
packages.subtitle: Sacred Journey to All 12 Abodes of Lord Shiva
packages.description:
Overview

Embark on a spiritually enriching pilgrimage covering all the 12 sacred Jyotirlingas of Lord Shiva across India. This 12 Jyotirlinga Complete Darshan tour is thoughtfully planned to ensure smooth travel, comfortable stays, and guided temple visits.

Experience divine blessings at the most revered Shiva temples including Somnath, Kedarnath, Kashi Vishwanath, Mahakaleshwar, Rameshwaram, and more—each holding deep spiritual and mythological significance.

Duration: 14 days, 13 nights

Departure: Fixed departures from major Indian cities

Style: Spiritual pilgrimage with guided darshan
inclusions: Transportation: All intercity transfers by AC coach / train / flight (as per itinerary)
Darshan: Assisted darshan at all Jyotirlinga temples
Sightseeing: All major pilgrimage sightseeing as per itinerary
exclusions: VIP Darshan tickets: Temple special entry charges

itinerary.description:

Meals: Dinner

Accommodation: Kedarnath

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Bhimashankar Jyotirlinga

itinerary.title: Baidyanath Dham
itinerary.description:
'Healing Abode'

itinerary.description:
'Sacred Hill Temple'

Visit Mallikarjuna Jyotirlinga at Srisailam.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Rameshwaram Jyotirlinga
itinerary.description:
'Southern Sacred Shrine'

Visit Ramanathaswamy Jyotirlinga and perform holy bath rituals.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Return Journey
itinerary.description:
'Gratitude & Reflection'

Begin return journey after completing all 12 Jyotirlinga darshans.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description:
'Journey Complete'

Tour concludes with divine blessings and cherished spiritual memories.

Meals: Breakfast

packages.title: Arunachal – Tawang Spring Trail
packages.subtitle: Snow-Capped Passes, Monasteries & Eastern Himalayas
packages.description:
Overview

Discover the untouched beauty of Northeast India with the Arunachal – Tawang Spring Trail. This scenic journey takes you through breathtaking mountain passes, serene monasteries, alpine valleys, and vibrant tribal culture.

Spring is the perfect season to experience blooming rhododendrons, snow-draped landscapes at Sela Pass, and crystal-clear views of the Eastern Himalayas. Ideal for nature lovers, adventure seekers, and cultural explorers.

Duration: 8 days, 7 nights

Departure: Fixed departures from Guwahati

Style: Scenic, cultural & soft adventure
inclusions: Transportation: All transfers & sightseeing by private vehicle
Permits: Inner Line Permit (ILP) for Arunachal Pradesh

itinerary.title: Arrival in Guwahati
itinerary.description:
'Gateway to Northeast'

Arrive in Guwahati and transfer to the hotel. Evening free to relax or explore local markets.

Accommodation: Hotel in Guwahati

Meals: Dinner

itinerary.title: Guwahati to Bomdila
itinerary.description:
'Journey into the Hills'

Drive towards Bomdila via scenic mountain roads. Visit Bomdila Monastery and local viewpoints.

Accommodation: Hotel in Bomdila

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Bomdila to Tawang via Sela Pass
itinerary.description:
'Snow & Serenity'

Drive through the iconic Sela Pass (13,700 ft) and visit Sela Lake. Experience snow-covered landscapes before reaching Tawang.

Accommodation: Hotel in Tawang

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Tawang Sightseeing
itinerary.description:
'Spiritual Heart of Arunachal'

Visit Tawang Monastery, the largest in India, followed by local markets and cultural exploration.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Madhuri Lake Excursion
itinerary.description:
'Hidden Himalayan Gem'

Excursion to Madhuri Lake (Sangestar Tso), surrounded by dramatic mountain scenery and frozen landscapes.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Tawang to Dirang
itinerary.description:
'Valleys & Rivers'

Drive down to Dirang Valley. Visit Dirang Dzong and enjoy riverside views.

Accommodation: Hotel in Dirang

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Dirang to Guwahati
itinerary.description:
'Return to the Plains'

Drive back to Guwahati through scenic landscapes.

Accommodation: Hotel in Guwahati

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description:
'Farewell to the Eastern Himalayas'

After breakfast, depart from Guwahati with unforgettable memories.

Meals: Breakfast

packages.title: Seven Sisters Complete Tour
packages.subtitle: Discover the Cultural & Natural Wonders of Northeast India
packages.description:
Overview

Explore the enchanting Northeast India with the Seven Sisters Complete Tour, covering all seven states—Assam, Meghalaya, Arunachal Pradesh, Nagaland, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura. This immersive journey blends breathtaking landscapes, vibrant tribal cultures, historic monasteries, lush valleys, and serene lakes.

From the living root bridges of Meghalaya and monasteries of Arunachal to the cultural heartlands of Manipur and Mizoram, this tour offers a comprehensive exploration of India’s most diverse and unexplored region.

Duration: 14 days, 13 nights

Departure: Fixed departures from Guwahati

Style: Cultural immersion, scenic & exploratory
inclusions: Transportation: All transfers & sightseeing by private vehicle
Permits: Inner Line Permits for restricted states

itinerary.title: Arrival in Guwahati
itinerary.description:
'Gateway to Northeast'

Arrive in Guwahati and transfer to hotel. Evening free for leisure or Brahmaputra riverfront walk.

Accommodation: Hotel in Guwahati

Meals: Dinner

itinerary.title: Kaziranga National Park
itinerary.description:
'Wildlife Encounters'

Drive to Kaziranga National Park. Enjoy an optional jeep safari in the park.

Accommodation: Hotel in Kaziranga

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Kaziranga to Shillong
itinerary.description:
'Meghalaya Highlands'

Travel to Shillong, the Scotland of the East. Visit Umiam Lake en route.

Accommodation: Hotel in Shillong

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Living Root Bridge & Cherrapunji
itinerary.description:
'Nature’s Architecture'

Visit Cherrapunji, explore waterfalls and the famous living root bridge.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Shillong to Bomdila
itinerary.description:
'Towards Arunachal'

Drive to Bomdila via scenic mountain routes.

Accommodation: Hotel in Bomdila

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Bomdila to Tawang
itinerary.description:
'High Passes & Monasteries'

Drive through Sela Pass and reach Tawang.

Accommodation: Hotel in Tawang

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Tawang Sightseeing
itinerary.description:
'Spiritual Arunachal'

Visit Tawang Monastery and local markets.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Tawang to Kohima
itinerary.description:
'Into Nagaland'

Travel towards Kohima, exploring tribal culture en route.

Accommodation: Hotel in Kohima

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Kohima Sightseeing
itinerary.description:
'Naga Heritage'

Visit Kohima War Cemetery and local villages.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Kohima to Imphal
itinerary.description:
'Manipur Landscapes'

Drive to Imphal.

Accommodation: Hotel in Imphal

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Imphal Sightseeing
itinerary.description:
'Floating Lake Wonders'

Visit Loktak Lake and explore the floating phumdis.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Imphal to Aizawl
itinerary.description:
'Mizoram Hills'

Travel to Aizawl, capital of Mizoram.

Accommodation: Hotel in Aizawl

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Aizawl to Agartala
itinerary.description:
'Tripura Heritage'

Proceed to Agartala and explore local culture.

Accommodation: Hotel in Agartala

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Departure from Agartala
itinerary.description:
'Journey Ends'

After breakfast, depart with unforgettable memories of Northeast India.

Meals: Breakfast

packages.title: Himachal Adventure Trail
packages.subtitle: Thrills in Manali, Solang, Kasol & Spiti Edge
packages.description:
Overview

The Himachal Adventure Trail is crafted for thrill-seekers and nature lovers who crave mountains, adrenaline, and raw Himalayan beauty. This journey blends adventure sports, scenic drives, riverside camping, and high-altitude landscapes.

From paragliding in Solang Valley to trekking trails near Spiti’s edge, river rafting in Kullu, and peaceful escapes in Kasol, this tour offers a perfect balance of excitement and serenity.

Duration: 9 days, 8 nights

Departure: Ex-Delhi / Chandigarh

Style: Adventure, mountains & outdoor experiences
inclusions: Transfers: All transfers and sightseeing by private AC vehicle (non-AC in hills)
Accommodation: 8 nights in adventure camps & premium hotels
Adventure activities: Paragliding, river rafting, guided trek
Sightseeing: All major attractions as per itinerary
exclusions: Optional activities: ATV rides, zipline, snow activities

itinerary.title: Arrival – Delhi to Manali
itinerary.description:
'Journey to the Himalayas'

Arrive in Delhi/Chandigarh and proceed on a scenic overnight journey to Manali through the Himalayan foothills.

Meals: Dinner

itinerary.title: Manali Local Sightseeing
itinerary.description:
'Gateway to Adventure'

Explore Hadimba Temple, Old Manali, Vashisht Hot Springs, and Mall Road.

Accommodation: Manali Hotel

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Solang Valley Adventure
itinerary.description:
'Thrill in the Air'

Enjoy paragliding, zorbing, and snow activities at Solang Valley.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Atal Tunnel – Sissu – Keylong
itinerary.description:
'Into the High Himalayas'

Drive through Atal Tunnel to Sissu Valley and experience raw Himalayan landscapes.

Accommodation: Camp Stay

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Keylong to Kasol via Kullu
itinerary.description:
'Rivers & Valleys'

En route river rafting in Kullu before reaching Kasol.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Kasol & Chalal Trek
itinerary.description:
'Trek into Serenity'

Short trek to Chalal Village followed by riverside relaxation.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Kasol to Shimla
itinerary.description:
'Colonial Hills'

Drive to Shimla with scenic Himalayan views.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Shimla Sightseeing
itinerary.description:
'Queen of Hills'

Visit Kufri, Jakhoo Temple, Ridge & Mall Road.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Departure – Shimla to Delhi
itinerary.description:
'Adventure Ends, Memories Begin'

Return journey with unforgettable adventure memories.

Meals: Breakfast

packages.title: Himachal Scenic Escape
packages.subtitle: Manali, Solang Valley, Shimla & Kufri
packages.description:
Overview

The Himachal Scenic Escape is a perfect domestic holiday designed for families, couples, and first-time Himalayan travelers. This tour blends snow-capped mountains, pine forests, colonial hill towns, and peaceful valleys.

Experience the charm of Manali, the adventure-filled Solang Valley, and the colonial elegance of Shimla with comfortable stays and relaxed sightseeing.

Duration: 7 days, 6 nights

Departure: Ex-Delhi / Chandigarh

Style: Leisure, mountains & scenic sightseeing
highlights: Mall Road Walks in Manali & Shimla
inclusions: Transfers: All transfers & sightseeing by private AC vehicle (non-AC in hills)

itinerary.title: Arrival – Delhi to Manali
itinerary.description:
'Journey to the Mountains'

Arrive in Delhi/Chandigarh and begin a scenic overnight drive to Manali through the Himalayan foothills.

Meals: Dinner

itinerary.title: Manali Local Sightseeing
itinerary.description:
'Discover Manali'

Visit Hadimba Temple, Vashisht Hot Springs, Old Manali & Mall Road.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Solang Valley Excursion
itinerary.description:
'Snow & Adventure'

Enjoy snow activities and scenic views at Solang Valley.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Manali to Shimla via Kullu
itinerary.description:
'Valleys & Rivers'

Drive to Shimla via Kullu Valley with river views.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Shimla & Kufri Sightseeing
itinerary.description:
'Queen of Hills'

Visit Kufri Snow Point, Jakhoo Temple, Ridge & Mall Road.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Free Day in Shimla
itinerary.description:
'Relax & Explore'

Enjoy leisure time for shopping or optional local activities.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Departure – Shimla to Delhi
itinerary.description:
'Tour Ends'

Return journey with unforgettable Himalayan memories.

Meals: Breakfast

packages.title: Himachal Family Delight
packages.subtitle: Manali, Kullu, Shimla & Kufri
packages.description:
Overview

The Himachal Family Delight tour is specially designed for families seeking a relaxed and comfortable holiday in the mountains. This tour covers popular hill destinations with easy travel pace and enjoyable sightseeing.

From temple visits in Manali to snow fun in Kufri and scenic drives through Kullu Valley, this package ensures a memorable family vacation.

packages.subtitle: Manali, Solang Valley & Shimla
packages.description:
Overview

The Romantic Himachal Honeymoon is a perfect escape for newlyweds seeking scenic beauty, cozy stays, and peaceful moments in the Himalayas.

Enjoy candlelight dinners, snow landscapes, and leisure time amidst breathtaking mountain views.
inclusions: Transfers: Private cab for the entire tour

itinerary.description: Tour concludes with beautiful memories.

packages.title: Kerala Backwaters & Ayurveda
packages.subtitle: Houseboats, Hill Stations & Rejuvenation
packages.description:
Overview

Kerala Backwaters & Ayurveda is a soul-soothing journey designed for travelers seeking relaxation, natural beauty, and holistic wellness. This experience blends misty hill stations, tranquil backwaters, serene beaches, and authentic Ayurvedic therapies.

Drift through palm-lined canals on a traditional houseboat, rejuvenate your body with time-tested Ayurvedic treatments, and explore Kerala’s rich culture and lush landscapes.

Duration: 8 days, 7 nights

Departure: Ex-Cochin

Style: Wellness, nature & slow travel
inclusions: Transfers: All airport transfers & sightseeing by private AC vehicle
Accommodation: 7 nights in premium resorts, houseboat & wellness retreat
Meals: Daily breakfast, houseboat meals & Ayurvedic diet (where applicable)
Sightseeing: All major attractions as per itinerary
exclusions: Optional activities: Additional spa therapies, water sports

itinerary.title: Arrival in Cochin – Transfer to Munnar
itinerary.description:
'Into the Western Ghats'

Arrive at Cochin Airport and drive to Munnar, visiting waterfalls and spice gardens en route.

Accommodation: Resort in Munnar

Meals: Dinner

itinerary.title: Munnar Sightseeing
itinerary.description:
'Tea & Tranquility'

Explore tea plantations, Mattupetty Dam, Echo Point, and Eravikulam National Park.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Munnar to Thekkady
itinerary.description:
'Spice Trails'

Drive to Thekkady and enjoy a guided spice plantation tour.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Thekkady to Alleppey Houseboat
itinerary.description:
'Floating Serenity'

Board your houseboat for a tranquil backwater cruise with freshly prepared Kerala meals.

Accommodation: Houseboat

Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner

itinerary.title: Alleppey to Varkala
itinerary.description:
'Cliffside Calm'

Disembark the houseboat and transfer to Varkala beach.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Varkala Ayurveda Therapy
itinerary.description:
'Heal & Rejuvenate'

Personalized Ayurvedic consultation followed by therapy sessions.

Meals: Breakfast, Ayurvedic Dinner

itinerary.title: Varkala Leisure & Culture
itinerary.description:
'Mindful Moments'

Enjoy free time at the beach and attend a Kathakali cultural performance.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Departure – Trivandrum / Cochin
itinerary.description:
'Relaxed & Renewed'

Transfer to the airport with refreshed body and mind.

Meals: Breakfast

packages.title: Ladakh Bike Expedition
packages.subtitle: Ride Through the World’s Highest Motorable Roads
packages.description:
Overview

The Ladakh Bike Expedition is a dream ride for adventure enthusiasts seeking extreme terrains, high-altitude passes, and breathtaking Himalayan landscapes. Designed for riders who crave thrill and endurance, this expedition takes you through some of the world’s highest motorable roads.

Experience the raw beauty of Nubra Valley, the serene Pangong Lake, mystical monasteries, and challenging mountain passes while riding through Leh–Ladakh’s iconic routes.

Duration: 10 days, 9 nights

Departure: Ex-Leh

Style: Motorcycle expedition & high-altitude adventure
inclusions: Motorcycle: Royal Enfield 411cc with fuel for the entire route

itinerary.title: Arrival in Leh – Acclimatization Day
itinerary.description:
'Welcome to the Land of High Passes'

Arrive in Leh and rest for acclimatization. Short evening walk around Leh Market.

Accommodation: Hotel in Leh

Meals: Dinner

itinerary.title: Leh Local Sightseeing
itinerary.description:
'Prepare & Explore'

Visit Shanti Stupa, Leh Palace, Magnetic Hill, and Sangam Point.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Leh to Nubra Valley via Khardung La
itinerary.description:
'Conquer Khardung La'

Ride through one of the highest motorable roads in the world to Nubra Valley.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Nubra Valley Exploration
itinerary.description:
'Desert in the Himalayas'

Visit Diskit Monastery and enjoy camel rides at Hunder.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Nubra to Pangong Lake
itinerary.description:
'Ride to the Blue Paradise'

Ride through scenic routes to reach the mesmerizing Pangong Lake.

Accommodation: Camp Stay

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Pangong to Hanle
itinerary.description:
'Remote Trails'

Ride towards Hanle via lesser-known routes, experiencing untouched landscapes.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Hanle to Leh
itinerary.description:
'Return to Civilization'

Ride back to Leh with panoramic views.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Leh – Free Day / Bike Maintenance
itinerary.description:
'Buffer Day'

Free day for rest, shopping, or bike maintenance.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Leh – Farewell Ride
itinerary.description:
'Celebration & Memories'

Group celebration dinner and ride recap.

Meals: Breakfast, Dinner

itinerary.title: Departure from Leh
itinerary.description:
'Ride Ends, Legends Begin'

Transfer to airport with unforgettable riding memories.

Meals: Breakfast
